summary: A redone version of Mara's Eye Den. Includes everything you need in a home and even a few surprises as well.
descriptionHtml:
This player home includes:

-Two Player Owned Beds (And an additional two Bedrolls for followers)

-Wood Chopping Block

-Forge, Smelter, Workbench

-Alchemy Table, Enchanting Table

-SAFE Storage

-No more blood

And a few hidden surprises!

Thank you for viewing and/or downloading this mod! Please leave suggestions and feedback in order for me to improve the mod. :)

!FIXED BLOOD AND WORKBENCH ISSUE!
author: Bulldog8787 and CalvinD26
